players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
You: "I am the mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. Bob is the detective, but he might not have all the pieces of the puzzle yet."
Bob: "I am the detective and I know Alice is the mafioso. I will continue to investigate and protect the villagers."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
